official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide paid leave for Federal employees participating in certain athletic activities as official representatives of the United States.

summary.text: Athletic Opportunities Assistance Act - Entitles any Federal employee who is an athlete or a coach in the official U.S. delegation to the pan-American games, the Olympic games, or an international athletic competition for the handicapped paid leave up to 90 days to prepare for or participate in such competition.
